name: Aster Sofa
description:
A balance between muscular hardwood frame and slim suspended seat lends the Aster sofa a unique visual appeal that is simultaneously airy and powerful. Smooth upholstered cushions proffer seating in proportions that are handsome, yet very comfortable. Aster is also available as a lounge chair or love seat: please contact us for dimensions and pricing.

As shown:
Dimensions - 78"W x 40"D x 29 1/4"H 
Hardwood - Eastern Black Walnut 
Aluminum - Chrome Powdercoat

name: Bendtable Coffee Table
description:
Crafted from a single piece of aluminum supporting a hardwood tabletop, the Bendtable efficiently combines the strength of its materials to form a sleek and elegant coffee table. The remarkably thin aluminum is granted additional stiffness by the surrounding wood. The aluminum also provides a convenient surface to place hot or cold beverages without requiring a coaster. The texture of the wood grain provides a pleasing complement to the smooth aluminum.

As shown: 
Dimensions - 41 1/2"W x 26"D x 17"H 
Hardwood - Northern Red Oak 
Aluminum - Brushed with Clearcoat

name: Flamingo Coffee Table
description:
Playfully approachable, the Flamingo coffee table's form is inspired by Alexander Calder's Flamingo stabile. Constructed from waterjet-cut aluminum with a powdercoat finish, Flamingo is an extremely durable table that can be used indoors or out. The surface is ideal for placing hot food or cold beverages. Flamingo also makes an excellent bench for porches or public spaces.

As shown:
Aluminum - Transparent Copper Powdercoat

name: Mercury End Table
description:
The Mercury end table's cantilever form makes it a perfect companion for your favorite chair or sofa. The powdercoated surface is ideal for working at a laptop or for holding drinks and snacks. The aluminum tabletop slots into a hand-carved hardwood base.

As shown:
Dimensions - 13 1/2"W x 24"D x 21"H 
Hardwood - Honduran Rosewood*
Aluminum - Pearl Grey Powdercoat

*The pictured examples were custom-made from reclaimed rosewood. Apart from reclaimed wood, we prefer to use only sustainably harvested American hardwoods.

name: Pocket Desk
description:
Constructed from a single sheet of bent aluminum with a hardwood lining, the simple elegance of the Pocket desk promotes a space for unfettered thinking. The work surface is sized for modern workflows: a laptop or LCD monitor. The shelf provides space for storing an external hard drive and the pencils and stacks of paper that might otherwise clutter your work surface.

As Shown:
Dimensions - 44"W x 20"D x 29"H 
Hardwood - American Black Cherry 
Aluminum - Pearl Grey Powdercoat
